sourcesContent: import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { useTheme } from "../../context/Theme"; import { Style } from './Style'; import { H1Style } from '../../components/Components' import NoticeLeft from "./componentsNoticies/NoticeLeft/NoticeLeft"; import NoticesRight from "./componentsNoticies/NoticesRight/NoticesRight"; import Topics from "./componentsNoticies/Topics/Topics"; export default function Noticias(){ const { themePage } = useTheme(); useEffect(() => { window.document.title = "PanimeE - Noticías" }) return( ); };
